channel.title: Forum soft ware vBulletin and more!
channel.description:
ok this is probs in the wrong section but idk at this mo in time very bizzy my cous just had a baby and has just gone home so i have been down there for a day or two helping here and cleaning the place
anyway...
vBulletin i heard that is you get it and put it on your site with out buying it then they can login and delete it off of your site with a master password and username i got my copy off of here moparisthebest.com dont know if i need a lisence to run it or even if i have one but what is the worse that can happen if they find out i had got it
same with invision2.2 (ipb2.2) what is the worse that could happen and which one is the best
(note to mods/admins(if this is in the wrong section i apologise and could you please move it))

SMF is better than vbulletin and also free and open source. :)[/quote]

Lies Vbulletin is better than smf because it’s more secure.
